tools.name: backgroundRemoval
tools.title: Background removal
tools.description: Automatically detect and remove the background from an image, leaving only the main subject.
tools.toolDescription: The background removal feature allows you to automatically detect and remove the background from an image with a single click, leaving only the main subject.
tools.errorMessage: Error removing background. Please try again.

tools.name: backgroundReplace
tools.title: Background replace
tools.description: Automatically detect and replace the background of an image with a new one.
tools.toolDescription: The background replace feature allows you to automatically detect and replace the background of an image with a single click.
tools.errorMessage: Error replacing background. Please try again.

tools.name: generativeRemove
tools.title: Generative remove
tools.description: Automatically detect and remove unwanted objects or areas from an image.
tools.toolDescription: The generative remove feature allows you to automatically detect and remove unwanted objects or areas from an image with precision.
tools.errorMessage: Error removing unwanted areas. Please try again.

tools.name: objectReplace
tools.title: Object replace
tools.description: Replace specific objects in an image with new ones.
tools.toolDescription: The object replace feature allows you to replace specific objects in an image with new ones, enabling creative transformations.
tools.errorMessage: Error replacing objects. Please try again.

tools.name: generativeFill
tools.title: Generative fill
tools.description: Fill missing or empty areas in an image with AI-generated content.
tools.toolDescription: The generative fill feature allows you to fill missing or empty areas in an image with AI-generated content, seamlessly blending with the existing image.
tools.errorMessage: Error filling generative content. Please try again.

tools.name: generativeRecolor
tools.title: Generative recolor
tools.description: Recolor an image using AI to create new color schemes.
tools.toolDescription: The generative recolor feature allows you to recolor an image using AI, creating new and visually appealing color schemes.
tools.errorMessage: Error recoloring the image. Please try again.

tools.name: generativeRestoreEnhance
tools.title: Generative restore & enhance
tools.description: Restore and enhance images with AI-powered tools for improved quality.
tools.toolDescription: The generative restore and enhance feature allows you to restore and enhance images using AI, improving their quality and adding creative styles.
tools.errorMessage: Error restoring and enhancing the image. Please try again.
